title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 3230 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
August 07, 2014

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 3230




On Thursday, August 7, 2014, the President signed into law:
H.R. 3230, the "Veterans Access, Choice, and Accountability Act of 2014," which amends various current, and introduces new, Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) authorities related toÂ  veteran health care provided by non-VA providers; improved access to care and health care administration; major medical facility leases; and veterans benefits matters.
